definition: to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Then mix in the raisins and chopped almonds.
sentences.chinese: 然後用手將提子和杏仁碎揉入。

sentences.english: And three, I make the best oatmeal raisin cookies in the world.
sentences.chinese: 我從不說謊，三，我做的提子燕麥餅乾是最好的。

sentences.english: Two, I never lie and three, I make the best oatmeal raisin cookies in the world.
sentences.chinese: 我從不說謊，三，我做的提子燕麥餅乾是最好的。

sentences.english: Melt butter in a large pan, pour in the dough and sprinkle in raisins.
sentences.chinese: 牛油入鍋融化，倒入拌好的麪糊，灑入提子。

sentences.english: Then mix in raisins and caraway seeds.
sentences.chinese: 然後加入提子和葛縷子籽。

definition: Hami melon (a variety of muskmelon)/honeydew melon/cantaloupe
red pitaya/dragon fruit/dragon pearl fruit (genus Hylocereus)
blue or green jujube/Chinese green date
Hami melon (a variety of muskmelon)/honeydew melon/cantaloupe/also written 哈密瓜
